description:
*   Are you felling bore with the regular wall papers. Or do you want look your Plam mobile having great wallpaper.

 *   By using this app you can view the great random wallpapers from google Picasa.

 *   By using this app you can browse unlimited random pics.

 *   This app will allow you to search pic’s from Picasa and Bing also and you can set it as a wall paper.

 *   By using this app you can find very great pictures and almost unseen pictures.

 *   By using this app the waiting time of a pic to load is very less, So definitely you will enjoy this app.

  *  This app is ad free.

  *  Shuffle Wallpaper Pro is suitable for all.
